post.body: Thanks. My LJ has its ups and downs depending on life. Titans took the division. But, the Steelers will take the conference ;)
I've always been partial to "Zenyatt√† Mondatta." 'Other Way of Stopping" is one of my favourite instrumentals.
My billing woes started before I switched to an iPhone to remained afterwards
I wish I'd known you were on campus. I could have shown you the Mac team and our Mac lab.
I love reading your feed, but I must point out that your icon is distracting and must eventually go away before the superbowl ;)
I had the same issue with them. I think their business is more about confusing customers with bad billing than phones.
Have you seen H's living artist blog? http://tinyurl.com/6nc8hd
Are there examples of your art or a portfolio online?
The question is... do you consider social networking applications a 'game.' I've been hearing fairly good returns there.
Following you now. Sorry. thought I'd added you already.
You reallly had to ask for more snow?
At one time I would have quickly come up with a witty comment about Google and Beta status. Now.. I think it might be bad for my job.
classic or new Who?
And the happiest of chunan um hakann err chamanku uhh chakakahn... Oh wait! Happy Chewbacca!
Wishing my @replies weren't put forth as my main status
contemplating why I tried to reply to a twitter from someone who has no clue who I am.
Trying to not doze off at the office. Really trying
Maybe I'll just crash when I get home and bathe the boy when we both wake up in the middle of the night
Second night where I spent the day tired and now must try to force myself to sleep. Really need to stop hanging out with @tylerdurden
Oh yes, please. That'd be nice (((O))_((o)))))))
Time to put theboy down for the night.
Up since 5am. 2mi walk to start. You'd think by 20 after midnight that I'd be more tired.
It's a Heroes night!
Long, long work day. Heading home
Aiiiigh! No LiveJournal! Aiiiigh! Wait... um.. I don't post that often
Monday means up at 5am. And I'm not really tired.
After that Steelers game, I could use a week's nap.
Parent vs. Child that won't nap leaves father in a really foul mood.
The house is utterly devoid of power. If anyone is interested in a social call from a nice family w/toddler; drop a text. No promises ;)
The grid transformer blows the power on the block... A Klingon would call it Glorious. http://piurl.com/u_S : current location
http://twitpic.com/s9hq - http://piurl.com/uw0 : current location SO WRONG!!! Christmas Challah!
Well, got the boy to hold out until 12:30 and then he wouldn't stay down for more than 5 minutes at a stretch
Long work day comes to a quiet and dark end
Optimistic from Yahoo Sports, but on course: The difference will be experience... PIT stronger in the 2nd half. PIT 23, BAL 13. I call 16-10
STR:8 DEX:10 INT:18 WIS:14 CON:11 CHA:5d2; comments?
Very tired tonight. Tired all day :-/
Why do I do so much social networking? Sometimes it sucks. More info more readily = not just overload but things you don't want to see. :-p
Up at 5am, decided not to walk in the ice and snow down hill. Set alarm from 7. Open window school called at 5:45 am. Now awake :-PPPP
I think this team is trying to kill me ;)
I'm calling the Over/Under on sacking big ben at 4; Calling over under sacks for the game 9. Steelers by 6.
Did about 30 minutes of footage with the family. Caught Aiden on film singing the Doctor Who theme. (Posted to YouTube). Off to get a Tree.
Hotel bed has just become too much. Up and can not get back to sleep at 5am. Hope to sleep like the dead tonight.
http://twitpic.com/whqp - Christmas snow and miracle. We have water and 1.5 FEET of snow! http://piurl.com/ywR : current location
http://twitpic.com/w9hh - http://piurl.com/ymr : current location Unexpected Xmas eve dinner at Chez Steen = WOW! 1/2 3d picture attached.
December 24th, 9pm. Eastern Standard Time. From here on in I shoot without a script. See if anything comes of it. Instead of my old s&#^.
And in a bout of holiday insanity, I gifted a copy of SJ Tucker's "Sirens" to @wilw despite being some unknown fan who just enjoys his work.
Twas a week before New years and all through the house, not a drip of water; no chance of a souse. Freeple NYE 08/09 is pretty much a bust.
Hey! 4 more inches of snow! Ain't life GRANNNNNNNNND :-p
30 minute in rush hour traffic in this snow to and back from daycare can really make you resent all humanity. http://piurl.com/yRE : current
Apparently parenthood has made me (more) cynical, jaded, and harbouring of resentment and lack of respect for childless people. I feel badly
http://twitpic.com/vgbf - http://piurl.com/y8A : current location @ Outback Steakhouse next to hotel. At least there will be water tonight.
http://piurl.com/y3Q : current location B&N books...sure. Running water! Even better.
Pictures may be delayed as we attempt to get supplies and probably head for a hotel tonight.
Snopocalypse continues. More pictures shortly
Bumping into ex's and their S.O.s on Social Networking can be ... disconcerting.
Toddler bed time. Always an adventure
Great... Mini momentary brown-outs. I wonder what the over/under for power outages is.
Going to attempt to extract photos of Sunday's snow
Of course now I'm completely awake (((O))_(o))))
Three cheers for SNOPud. Less than 30 minutes and I got to watch them pull a he'll of a branch out of our power lines!
